select a.realname,a.username,a.user_id,a.sex,a.mobile,a.email,e.name as deptName,a.status,a.create_time,a.dept_id, a.post,a.parent_id, (select b.realname from wk_admin_user as b where b.user_id = a.parent_id) as parentName from wk_admin_user as a left join wk_admin_dept as e on a.dept_id = e.dept_id
left join wk_admin_user_role as g on a.user_id = g.user_id
where 1=1
and (a.realname like concat('%', #{data.realname}, '%') or a.mobile like concat('%',#{data.realname}, '%'))
and a.dept_id in
#{item}
and a.status = #{data.status}
AND DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) <= date(a.create_time)
and a.status='2'
and a.status = '0'
and g.role_id=#{data.roleId}
order by status desc

select a.*, case when LENGTH( tmp_char) > 1 && tmp_loc > 0 && tmp_loc < 24 THEN (ELT(tmp_loc,'A','B','C','D','E','F','G','H','J','K','L','M','N','O','P','Q','R','S','T','W','X','Y','Z')) ELSE UPPER(tmp_char) end as initial from ( select au.realname,au.username,au.mobile,au.post,ad.name as deptName ,au.dept_id,au.user_id,au.status as user_status, case when (select count(1) from wk_admin_attention where be_user_id = au.user_id and attention_user_id = #{data.userId}) > 0 then 1 ELSE 0 end as status, INTERVAL(CONV(HEX(CONVERT(LEFT(realname,1) USING GBK)),16,10), 0xB0A1,0xB0C5,0xB2C1,0xB4EE,0xB6EA,0xB7A2,0xB8C1,0xB9FE,0xBBF7,0xBFA6,0xC0AC,0xC2E8,0xC4C3,0xC5B6,0xC5BE,0xC6DA,0xC8BB,0xC8F6,0xCBFA,0xCDDA ,0xCEF4,0xD1B9,0xD4D1) as tmp_loc, LEFT(realname,1) as tmp_char from wk_admin_user as au LEFT JOIN wk_admin_dept as ad on au.dept_id = ad.dept_id ) as a where user_status = 1
and dept_id = #{data.deptId}
and (realname like concat('%', #{data.search}, '%') or username like concat('%', #{data.search}, '%'))
and status = #{data.status}
ORDER BY initial
desc
asc
select user_id,realname,img,post from wk_admin_user where dept_id = #{deptId} and status != 0
